archimate:BusinessObject.name: Quotation
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
A Quotation is a pre-order that allows a Customer to get offline approval before placing an order.
If the quote has a "Commitment to Buy", the Supplier should hold stock for 30 days, or as per Commercial Agreement rules.
See also https://docs.oasis-open.org/ubl/os-UBL-2.1/UBL-2.1.html#S-QUOTATION
